__e: Fortunately, for us, our problem is your problem.
Fortunately for us our music was a lot better than the name of the band, bro!
Luckily for us there isn't a lot of light six feet under, which is why this little beauty... .. could still probably buy your lunch.
Lucky for you there's nothing else to do right now.
Lucky for you, I like the sound of my own voice, because listen, this DNA thing isn't even the best part.
That's what I'd do if I were you, which, lucky for you, I'm not.
Lucky for you, I like the sound of my own voice, because listen, this DNA thing isn't even the best part.
Luckily for me, there are guys in this world who are not like you.
The craftsmanship is incredible. Lucky for you, the same can be said about this.
Thankfully the programme that made him this way is no longer.
Thankfully, black is still the new black, so I've still got that going on.
Fortunately mine's hangs a little to the left, which is the only reason I'm alive.
But, luckily, it wasn't that bad, So he should be just fine.
Fight for your country... and their life is something you never had to do...
Fortunately you don't have to know all that many words to date in highschool.
Fortunately, Jim, the fate of the company doesn't depend on one man.
Fortunately, most people are content to follow the normal course and take things as they are.
And I said: "Fortunately the people of the country does not look like you"
Fortunately, my son and his friends were here at the time, hoping to get the place ready for the handover.
Fortunately, my family knows that this is the best thing for me to keep doing this as long as I can.
Fortunately, the occupants are out of town, so the only casualty's the perp.
Fortunately, for us we have both friends and money.
